code: import React,{useState}from'react';import projectsData from'../../data/ProjectsData';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{const[selectedTech,setSelectedTech]=useState('All');const handleFilterChange=tech=>{setSelectedTech(tech);};const filterProjects=tech=>{if(tech==='All'){return projectsData;}return projectsData.filter(project=>project.technologies.includes(tech));};const technologies=['All','React','CSS','JavaScript','Node.js','Express','MongoDB','Python','Django','PostgreSQL'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"filter-buttons",children:technologies.map(tech=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleFilterChange(tech),className:selectedTech===tech?'active':'',children:tech},tech))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projects-list",children:filterProjects(selectedTech).map(project=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:project.image,alt:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:project.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.link,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"View Project"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-tech",children:project.technologies.join(', ')})]},project.id))})]});};export default Projects;
